requirements.summary: Create modern landing page with hero section, features overview, and call-to-action elements
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page includes prominent hero section with value proposition
Key features are displayed in an organized, scannable format
Clear call-to-action buttons are present (e.g., 'Get Started', 'Request Demo')
Page is fully responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop

file_operations.description: Replace existing app content with landing page structure including hero section with headline, subheadline, and CTA buttons, followed by features overview section. Wire in the generated hero banner image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1200x600.png as the hero background. Ensure responsive layout using Tailwind CSS classes.

Create Hero component with prominent value proposition headline, supporting text, and primary/secondary CTA buttons ('Get Started', 'Request Demo'). Use the generated hero banner image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1200x600.png as background. Implement responsive design with mobile-first approach using Tailwind CSS.

Create FeaturesOverview component displaying grid of key payroll features in organized, scannable format. Use card-based layout with responsive columns (mobile: 1, tablet: 2, desktop: 3). Prepare structure for feature items that will be populated in REQ-2.

requirements.summary: Display core payroll features with descriptions and visual organization
acceptanceCriteria: Each feature is presented with clear description
Features are organized in logical groupings
Visual hierarchy makes key capabilities immediately apparent

file_operations.description: Create FeatureCard component to display individual feature with icon, title, and description. Use shadcn/ui Card component for consistent styling. Accept icon, title, and description as props. Implement visual hierarchy with appropriate typography sizes and spacing.

Populate FeaturesOverview with all core payroll features: employee management (using frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-employees.dim_64x64.png), payroll processing, tax filing and compliance (using frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-tax.dim_64x64.png), direct deposit (using frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-payment.dim_64x64.png), time tracking integration, benefits administration, and reporting capabilities (using frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-reports.dim_64x64.png). Group features logically and render using FeatureCard components. Ensure visual hierarchy emphasizes key capabilities.

requirements.summary: Highlight mobile access capabilities and platform accessibility
acceptanceCriteria: Mobile access capabilities are prominently featured
Section includes relevant information about platform accessibility

file_operations.description: Create MobileAccessSection component highlighting mobile access capabilities and platform accessibility. Include heading, descriptive text about mobile app availability, cross-platform support, and accessibility features. Use responsive layout with visual emphasis on mobile-first design. Implement using Tailwind CSS for styling.
Wire MobileAccessSection component into the landing page layout, positioned after FeaturesOverview section. Ensure proper spacing and visual flow.

requirements.summary: Create informational sections for compliance, security, and tax filing features
acceptanceCriteria: Compliance and security information is clearly presented
Tax filing capabilities (W-2s, 1099s, quarterly reports) are detailed

file_operations.description: Create ComplianceSection component presenting compliance and security information with trust-building content. Include subsections for tax filing capabilities (W-2s, 1099s, quarterly reports), data security measures, and regulatory compliance. Use professional tone and clear presentation. Implement using shadcn/ui components for consistent styling.
Wire ComplianceSection component into the landing page layout, positioned after MobileAccessSection. Ensure proper spacing and visual hierarchy that builds credibility.

requirements.summary: Implement professional, trustworthy visual theme with sophisticated color palette and clean typography
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme evokes professionalism and trust appropriate for financial services
Typography is clean, readable, and professional
Layout structure is organized and facilitates easy information scanning
Visual style is consistent throughout all pages and components

file_operations.description: Update global styles and CSS variables to implement professional color palette appropriate for financial/payroll services (deep blues, grays, accent colors that evoke trust and reliability). Define typography scale with clean, readable font families. Establish consistent spacing and layout utilities. Update Tailwind CSS theme configuration if needed for custom colors.

Extend Tailwind configuration with custom color palette for financial/payroll theme (primary, secondary, accent colors), custom font families for professional typography, and spacing scale that supports organized layouts. Ensure configuration supports the visual theme across all components.
